places.name: Pashupatinath Temple
places.description: UNESCO site on the Bagmati river. Best visited early morning.
places.tips: Dress respectfully; photography restricted in inner areas.

places.name: Bhaktapur Durbar Square
places.description: Historic square with Nyatapola Temple and traditional craft.
places.tips: Try juju dhau (curd) and explore side alleys.
